entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: Tomorrow is two months since then WH chief of staff Mick Mulvaney told a crowd at CPAC the press was only covering coronavirus because “they think this is going to be what brings down the President."
